User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Zenith Planner application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

BMI.title: BMI
BMI.description: Represents a user's Body Mass Index (BMI) data at a point in time.

id.description: Unique identifier for the BMI record.

date.description: The date when the BMI was recorded.

height.description: User's height in meters at the time of recording.

weight.description: User's weight in kilograms at the time of recording.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a single task for a user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the task.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this task.

deadline.description: The deadline for the task as a Firestore Timestamp.

completed.description: Whether the task has been completed.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the task was created.

Mission.title: Mission
Mission.description: Represents a long-term goal or mission for a user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the mission.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this mission.

progress.description: The user-reported progress of the mission, from 0 to 100.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the mission was created.

totalGoals.description: The total number of goals for this mission.

completedGoals.description: The number of completed goals for this mission.

Goal.title: Goal
Goal.description: Represents a single goal or sub-task for a mission.

id.description: The unique identifier for the goal.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this goal.

missionId.description: The ID of the mission this goal belongs to.

completed.description: Whether the goal has been completed.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the goal was created.
